mapper.delete: delete from collection where user_id = #{userId} and recipe_id = #{recipeId}
mapper.select: select r.recipe_id, r.user_id, r.recipe_name, r.pic_url, r.material, r.profile, u.user_id "user.user_id", u.username "user.username" from collection c inner join recipe r on c.recipe_id = r.recipe_id inner join user u on r.user_id = u.user_id where c.user_id = #{userId}
